actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to further the foreign policy purposes of the Export Administration Act of 1969 (as amended) by amending such act to impose export controls on nuclear fuel and technology when export of such fuel and technology is likely to contribute to the proliferation of nuclear weapons.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Export Administration Act, the export of nuclear fuel and technology to any country which makes such items available to a third country which is not a party to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

titles.title: A bill to further the foreign policy purposes of the Export Administration Act of 1969 (as amended) by amending such act to impose export controls on nuclear fuel and technology when export of such fuel and technology is likely to contribute to the proliferation of nuclear weapons.
